title: Boston Bruins ' revenue 2005 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 14 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012/13 and 2013/14.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 228.0 was reached at Year 2018/19
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 86.0 was reached at Year 2005/06
